abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 380 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 190 Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 185 Health, dealing 185 damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

heroics.name: Divine Shield
heroics.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Divine Storm
heroics.description: Deal 187 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.
